item.title: Player was 'overwhelmed' after World Cup kiss, court hears
item.description: Teammates of Jenni Hermoso have testified in a trial over a kiss between her and former football chief Luis Rubiales.

item.title: Man launches fight against fine for loudspeaker call at French station
item.description: The outraged passenger hires a lawyer to dispute the fine over a public phone call in Nantes.

item.title: False video claims Hollywood stars were paid by USAID to visit Ukraine
item.description: The video claiming that USAID paid Hollywood celebrities millions of dollars to visit Ukraine is not real and has hallmarks of a Russian disinformatio...

item.title: Trump says Israel will hand over Gaza to US after fighting ends
item.description: The president reiterates that the idea would mean resettling Palestinians, and that no US soldiers would be needed.

item.title: State of emergency declared for Santorini after quakes
item.description: More than 11,000 people have already left the island of Santorini following a series of tremors in recent days.
